```{r}
library("dplyr")
library("tidyverse")
```

# Creating a data frame:
```{r}
# create the empty data frame
vaccination_df <- data.frame( age = character(),
                  pop_not_vax = double(),
                  po_not_vax_per = double(),
                  pop_vax = double(),
                  pop_vax_per = double(),
                  case_not_vax = double(),
                  case_vax = double()
)

vaccination_df

```

# Adding values into the dataframe
```{r}

vaccination_df <- vaccination_df %>% 
add_row(
  age = "under 50",
  pop_not_vax = 1116834,
  po_not_vax_per = 0.233,
  pop_vax = 3501118,
  pop_vax_per = 0.730,
  case_not_vax = 43,
  case_vax = 11
) %>% 
  add_row(
    age = "over 50",
    pop_not_vax = 186078,
    po_not_vax_per = 0.079,
    pop_vax = 2133516,
    pop_vax_per = 0.904,
    case_not_vax = 171,
    case_vax = 290
  )

vaccination_df

```

# Creating a CSV file
```{r}

write.csv(vaccination_df, "C:/Users/Uzma/CUNY-SPS-Assignments/data_607/week5/vaccination_data_analysis.csv", row.names=FALSE)


```

# Reading from a CSV file

```{r}
vaccine_df <- read_csv( file = "C:/Users/Uzma/CUNY-SPS-Assignments/data_607/week5/vaccination_data_analysis.csv")
```

glimpse(vaccine_df)
